name: Genera Studio
description:
Genera Studio is a graphic design firm. Our multidisciplinary team is formed by specialists in branding, graphic design, marketing and web design, creating a comprehensive environment that provides intelligent and effective solutions.
Our services specialize in three areas: design and creation of brand, advertising design and web design and development, of which we contemplate specific services such as logo design and corporate identity, name and slogan management, marketing strategies and web pages.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Av. Garza Sada 6804, Lagos del Bosque
